title: Search and State’s Field Shorts in Camo
content:
Shorts? What shorts? I don’t see any shorts.

Search and State’s Field Shorts just got a camo print for spring/summer 2024, and we’re digging them! The Field Shorts feature an 8″ inseam and are made in New York City with local materials from the NYC fabric district. Over time, they soften and break in from riding and everyday wear. Check out more at Search and State.

The post Search and State’s Field Shorts in Camo appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
